PERSONA.NAME: Edward, Prince of Wales
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Afterwards King Edward V, son to King Edward, is murdered on Gloucester's order.

PERSONA.NAME: Richard, Duke of York
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Second son to King Edward, murdered in the tower

PERSONA.NAME: George, Duke of Clarence
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Brother to the King, father to Edward Plantagenet, murdered on Gloucester's order.

PERSONA.NAME: Richard, Duke of Gloucester
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Afterwards King Richard III, brother to the King. Marries Lady Anne then has her killed. Killed by Richmond at Bosworth Field.

PERSONA.NAME: Edward Plantagenet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Earl of Warwick, young son to Clarence. Thinks Edward IV ordered his father's death.

PERSONA.NAME: Henry, Earl of Richmond
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Henry Tudor, afterwards King Henry VII. Kills Richard III at Bosworth Field. Marries Edward IV's daughter. Eventually ends the Wars of the Roses.

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Buckingham
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Richard's ally who is later executed.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl of Surrey
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to the Duke of Norfolk, a supporter of Richard III.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl Rivers
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also Anthony Woodville, brother to Queen Elizabeth. He opposes Richard III and is executed.

PERSONA.NAME: Marquess of Dorset
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Queen Elizabeth from her first marriage. Fights with Richmond in France.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Grey
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Queen Elizabeth. He opposes Richard III and is executed.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Hastings
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lord Chamberlain, later killed by Richard III.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Stanley
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called the Earl of Derby, supports Richmond.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Thomas Vaughan
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Executed with Earl Rivers and Lord Grey.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir James Tyrrel
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He murders the princes in the tower.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Mayor of London
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Leads citizens who proclaim Gloucester as Richard III.

PERSONA.NAME: Elizabeth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Queen to King Edward IV, later a widow who tries to stop Richard.

PERSONA.NAME: Margaret
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: French-born widow of King Henry VI.

PERSONA.NAME: Duchess of York
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Widow of the Duke of York, mother to King Edward IV, Clarence, and Gloucester

PERSONA.NAME: Lady Anne
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Widow of Edward (Prince of Wales, son to King Henry VI), afterwards married to Richard (Duke of Gloucester). Later she is murdered by Richard III.

PERSONA.NAME: Margaret Plantagenet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Countess of Salisbury, a young daughter of Clarence

PERSONA.NAME: Ghost of Henry the Sixth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The ghost of Henry the Sixth.

PERSONA.NAME: Ghosts of The Two Young Princes
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The ghosts of the two young Princes.

PERSONA.NAME: Page
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A page to Richard III who brings Tyrrel to him.
